hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If anyone is killed blindly or, when people are throwing stones, by a stone or a whip, his blood-wit is the blood-wit for an accidental murder. But if anyone is killed intentionally, retaliation is due. If anyone tries to prevent it, the curse of Allah, of angels, and of all the people will rest on him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ قَتَلَ فِي عِمِّيَّا بَيْنَ قَوْمٍ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Is Killed Blindly While The People Are Fighting
